fulltext:
Pham Mai My 
English name: Bell Pham 
Email:  phammaimy1994@gmail.com 
Phone number: 0909 581 520 
Gender: Female 
Address: District 9, HCM city, Viet Nam 
Position Applied: QA/Tester 
Overview 
●
2.5 years in IT industry, 1 years in developer, 1.5 years in QA 
●
Experience in working with English and Australian partners in current job 
●
Experience in working with many management tools: Bitbucket, Sourcetree, FileZilla, 
JIRA, . . . 
●
Experience in working with outsourcing environment 
●
Experience in working with foreigner 
●
Ability to build websites 
●
Can communicate in English  
●
Reason for leaving: everything is at stable stage 
●
Therefore, I looks out for challenges in another environment. 
●
Expected salary: from $800 Net 
●
Notice period: at least 30 days 
Summary 
●
2.5 years using Bitbucket, Jira, sourcetree, . . . 
●

framework AngularJS, Angular 2 
●

●
1 year of experience in Wordpress  
●
1 year of experience in testing manual test & automation test using Selenium

Support team to find out bugs

●
Understanding requirement from clients 
Career summary 
April 2016 - October 2016:
Kerofrog 
Fresher Backend PHP Developer  
October 2016 - Feb 2018:
Zentech 
Frontend Developer 
March 2018 - Now:
The App Team Viet Nam 
Tester & Administrator  
Experience 
Tester: 
Project: Go Team 
Project description: 
-
Go Team app features a unique follow arrow that helps guide teams to their waypoints. 
Once members arrive at their destination, GPS-triggered challenges are issued to the 
teams in the form of questions, clues, and pictures that they will work on together to 
complete. Updates, feedback and scores are kept in real-time as teams progress 
through their amazing race. Back at home base, each team is monitored and can receive 
bonus missions at key points in their adventure. 
Position: Tester 
My Responsibility:  
-
Understanding requirements of project 
-
Writing test cases, test results 
-
Check data from backend using Postman 
-
Writing test cases to test data from backend by Postman 
-
Test manual: 
-
 Website admin 
-
App of customer on mobile & tablet (iOS & android) 
-
Automation test: 
-
Writing functional test cases using framework Selenium 
-
Report bugs using Jira 
-
Restore functions test into Bitbucket 
-
Using Sourcetree to pull automation test code 
Project: Handel
Project description:  
Handel-Driver: a service sharing app for waste management, providing quick and quality 
service, and on-demand delivery 
Handel-Customer: Bringing waste management into the digital age, the handel: App is the 
simplest way to purchase a waste removal service.
